backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that proxies authenticated Binance Futures API calls (place/cancel orders) via HTTP outcalls, with helper functions for building signed query strings and a transform function for response normalization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (frontend tabs, proxy service, dashboard, order terminal, settings) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON dictionary providing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's component and hook structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app with PWA manifest link, theme color, Apple touch icon, and mobile web app meta tags for the Crypto Position Monitor.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Crypto Position Monitor specifying app name, icons, standalone display mode, dark background, gold theme color, and an 'Add Position' shortcut.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for HTML and Binance API calls, with install/activate lifecycle handlers to manage versioned caches.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that renders the header, tab navigation (Dashboard, Order Terminal, Settings), live trading banner, and credential status indicator, while exposing the ICP actor globally for the proxy service.
frontend/src/components/CredentialStatus: Memoized badge component that listens for credential-change events and displays either an 'API Connected' or 'No API Key' badge based on stored credentials.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx: Dashboard tab that displays open futures positions with live price polling every 5 seconds, supports importing positions from Binance, and shows PnL calculations with export/clear controls.
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingBanne: Memoized banner component that renders a warning strip when live trading is enabled, listening for live-trading-change events to update its visibility.
frontend/src/components/OrderTerminalTab: Order terminal UI for placing Binance Futures orders (MARKET, LIMIT, STOP_MARKET, TAKE_PROFIT_MARKET) with live price polling, symbol search, and live/paper trading mode awareness.
frontend/src/components/SettingsTab.tsx: Settings tab for managing Binance API credentials (save, clear, test connection via HMAC-SHA256 signing) and toggling live trading mode with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: Sticky tab navigation bar rendering Dashboard, Order Terminal, and Settings tabs with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated via Internet Identity) and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: React Query hook that fetches and caches the list of active PERPETUAL trading pairs from the Binance Futures exchange info endpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveTradingMode.ts: Empty file placeholder for a live trading mode hook.
Empty file placeholder for a portfolio exposure hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: Empty file placeholder for a position monitoring hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: Empty file placeholder for a position storage hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Empty file placeholder for a PWA install prompt hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder module indicating that backend operations use direct Binance API calls or the Motoko proxy via binanceProxyService.
Empty file placeholder for a sentiment analysis hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: Empty file placeholder for a trend prediction hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, imports Space Grotesk and JetBrains Mono fonts, and defines a dark terminal-themed design system with OKLCH color variables for profit/loss, charts, and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Service module for fetching data from the Binance Futures API, including perpetual pairs, current prices, and OHLCV klines.
frontend/src/services/binanceOrderServic: Empty file placeholder for a Binance order service.
frontend/src/services/binancePositionSer: Empty file placeholder for a Binance position service.
frontend/src/services/binanceProxyServic: Service that routes Binance trading operations (market, limit, stop, take-profit orders and cancellations) through a Motoko backend actor using stored API credentials.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: Empty file placeholder for adjustment-related types.
frontend/src/types/aiTrade.ts: Empty file placeholder for AI trade-related types.
frontend/src/types/binanceApi.ts: Empty file placeholder for Binance API types.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: Empty file placeholder for calculator-related types.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: Empty file placeholder for exposure-related types.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: Defines the Position interface representing a trading position with symbol, side, entry price, quantity, and leverage.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: Empty file placeholder for prediction-related types.
frontend/src/types/recovery.ts: Empty file placeholder for recovery-related types.
frontend/src/types/reversal.ts: Empty file placeholder for reversal-related types.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: Empty file placeholder for scenario-related types.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: Empty file placeholder for sentiment-related types.
frontend/src/types/tradeHistory.ts: Empty file placeholder for trade history types.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Empty file placeholder for adjustment suggestion utilities.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeHistoryStorage: Empty file placeholder for AI trade history storage utilities.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeSelection.ts: Empty file placeholder for AI trade selection utilities.
frontend/src/utils/binanceAuth.ts: Empty file placeholder for Binance authentication utilities.
frontend/src/utils/credentialsStorage.ts: Utility functions for saving, retrieving, clearing, and checking Binance API key and secret in localStorage, with a custom event dispatched on changes.
Empty file placeholder for exposure calculation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/liveTradingStorage.ts: Empty file placeholder for live trading storage utilities.
frontend/src/utils/marketReversalDetecto: Empty file placeholder for market reversal detection utilities.
frontend/src/utils/performanceCalculatio: Empty file placeholder for performance calculation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Provides a calculatePnL function that computes USD and percentage profit/loss for a position given a current price, accounting for leverage and direction.
frontend/src/utils/positionRecoveryEngin: Empty file placeholder for position recovery engine utilities.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Empty file placeholder for position size calculator utilities.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Empty file placeholder for service worker registration utilities.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Empty file placeholder for scenario simulation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Empty file placeholder for sentiment analysis utilities.
frontend/src/utils/smcAnalysis.ts: Smart Money Concepts (SMC) analysis library that detects institutional market structure signals including swing points, BOS, CHOCH, order blocks, fair value gaps, liquidity zones, Wyckoff phases, and manipulation patterns from OHLCV kline data.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Empty file placeholder for stop-loss calculation utilities.
Empty file placeholder for take-profit calculation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Empty file placeholder for technical analysis utilities.
frontend/src/utils/totalCapitalStorage.t: Empty file placeholder for total capital storage utilities.
frontend/src/utils/tradeHistoryStorage.t: Empty file placeholder for trade history storage utilities.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Empty file placeholder for trend prediction utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with oklch-based CSS variable colors, custom fonts (Space Grotesk, JetBrains Mono), golden glow box shadows, accordion/pulse-gold animations, and the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 75) describing a crypto trading app built on React + Motoko/ICP, listing architectural notes, known bugs (frozen live trade mode, missing import button, limited pair selectors), and a catalog of existing implemented features.
